1370: Lutghardis moved to Die Camp.A.14 after marriage.
Got married to Walwin at age 18 in 1370.
Gave birth to Sibrando in 1370 at age 18.
1371: Gave birth to Cofte in 1371 at age 19.
1372: Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 2 years old.
1376: Gave birth to Godeweris in 1376 at age 24.
1377: Gave birth to Gheesen in 1377 at age 25.
1378: Gave birth to Walburgis in 1378 at age 26.
1388: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1388 at age 36.
1390: Lost daughter Reynwi when Reynwi was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Reynwi in 1390 at age 38.
1392: Gave birth to Lubertus in 1392 at age 40.
